channel.title: Introspection on Shreyas Mayya
channel.description: Recent content in Introspection on Shreyas Mayya

item.title: The Humorist
item.description: I’ve been noticing something over the last few weeks–I like to crack jokes. A lot. Here are just a few examples from recent text conversations1: When I failed to properly read information about the school district opening back up for the next school year: “Hey, they only mentioned science and technology in our school’s name, not literacy."2 After reading a post by the principal about how we were more than our our GPAs: “Dr.
